Fantastic product ! Here's a brief review:Thrilled with my new PS4 DualShock controller from Happy Gaming World! Exceptional service, fast delivery, and a top-quality product. Responsive controls, great battery life. Highly recommend!

Worth the price not like sony controllers but clearly justify its price all function works pretty well like sony controllers pairing is not done with the cable and have to pair it manually with the bluetooth one thing better than sony controllers is its battery life its more than real controller

It's really good! At first, I had trouble connecting it to my laptop, but then I realized I was doing it wrong. After fixing the issue in settings, it connected immediately. It's a great controller , looks good, works even better, feels sturdy in hand, and has no latency issues.

Totally satisfied, epic vibrations, not delay, I've been using it for like a month now not any issue yet. The battery life is just amazing it lasts about 12-15 hours with normal play and 6-7 hours with vibration play. Go for it just amazing for its price.

At first it was an okay one... well for this price range what else we'll get!!! After couple of months Slight stick drift issues appeared in the left stick.Apart from this issue the battery capacity also got decreased slightly. That's all, rest of it is just okay.

After original got damaged, this ps4 controller works great.. Vibration and control just good... Nothing bad about this controller.. But if you need fine and super smooth control like original that you will miss but there is no problem in this all...

Very good controller for my Samsung TV.Works exactly like a original dual shock pS4 controller.Vibration feedback is also working via remote play.Best bluetooth controller in this price.Thank you HappyGamingWorld for providing this awesome controller.

A great steal for such a good controller. I haven't been playing any heavy games with so vibration sensation was not that for me. The Six - Axis gyroscope doesn't work or I might not know how to use it. Build quality is fantastic for a good PS4 controller. I you want a cheap and fabulous and a pretty good product, I would really recommend to buy this product
Vibration motor not working

I ordered this because its extremely hard to find the original in red. That being said, I was shocked to see that there is barely any quality difference between this and the original. The vibration maybe a little on the lower side and controller speaker doesn't work (could be just my piece). When trying to pair this to your Ps4 I would recommend going to your bluetooth settings and doing it manually. Long press the PS button to pair it. This is important or else you will think you bought a fa...

Very impressed by the hg world ps4 controller. Its really good for the price. The feel is great and is very close to the original one. Obviously the vibrations won't be as great as the sony's controller but for this price, it is a great controller to be used as a secondary for occasional two player gaming! Tried god of war Ragnarok with it, and it was smooth.
Best controller I'll buy again in future
